text: Ust Allohe, ki sumoro xalifagoni zamin kard va ʙa'zero ʙar ʙa'zi digar ʙa daracaho ʙartari dod, to sumoro dar cize, ki dodaast, ʙijozmojad. Alʙatta Parvardigorat kasero, ki az U nofarmoni kunad, zud cazo medihad va alʙatta U ʙaxsandavu mehruʙon ast, ʙa kase ki ʙa Vaj imon ʙijovarad va amali soleh ancom dihad va az gunohi kaʙira tavʙa kunad
